pr_title: bugfix(rest-api): Should return a 404 if MIME type not found

timeline.message: bugfix(rest-api): Should return a 404 if MIME type not found

timeline.bodyText: "/viewerconfig/" is repeated in this file. Should be a constant.
timeline.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText: Ah yes! Thank you. There was one, now there are two. I'll rework.
replies.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: I'm assuming that it also handles the same for an empty string MIME type? Have you tested that?
timeline.author: SammyIsConfused

replies.bodyText: I'll have a play. I am/was hoping the framework looks after that - as swagger shows them as mandatory, so I'm thinking it should know what's going on. But... not confident in that. 😉
replies.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: I have now tested, and yes. Seeing it's path vars, if you start dropping some etc then it triggers the 404. So all good.
replies.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message:
chore(rest-api): Keep MimeTypeApiTest DRY

Feedback from PR #2346
